headline: Redwire Corporation (RDW) Announces Planned Board Refreshment
summary: Redwire Corporation (NYSE:RDW) is among the 9 Defense Stocks That Will Skyrocket. On October 7, the company announced a planned refreshment of its Board of Directors. The Board has appointed Dorothy D. Hayes and General (Ret.) James McConville as new independent directors. John S. Bolton and Jonathan Baliff, who joined the Board under Redwire Corporation […]
